sim.entity

Interface MoverEntity

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Entity

    public interface MoverEntity
    A facade for the Entity class that provides all of the methods needed for an entity to move.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void alert(java.lang.String message)
      Request The entity notify the user of an event.
      FirePort atFirePort()
      Determine if the entity is at a fire port in a building.
      void clearCircle()
      Clear the circle order for this entity.
      void clearFirePort()
      If the entity is at a fire port, exit it and clear the fire port.
      void clearGotoFloor()
      Clears the order for an entity to move to a floor in a building.

      Causes an entity to consume an amount of fuel.
      boolean enterBridge(BridgeEntity bridge)
      Cause an entity to enter a vehicle deployed bridge.

      If the entity is in a pit, exit it.

      Determine if an entity has fired recently.

      Get the altitude for this entity (if it is a flier).

      Get the height of the entity off the ground for ground movers.

        Returns:

        Returns:
        true if mounted.

        boolean isStopped()
        Test if the entity is currently at a stop node.
        Returns:
        True if stopped.

      • isSuppressed

        boolean isSuppressed()
        Test if the entity is currently suppressed.
        Returns:
        true if suppressed.

      • isTracing

        boolean isTracing()

        Returns:
        True if tracing is active.

      • isUploading

        boolean isUploading(double clock)
        Test if this entity is currently uploading, given the current clock.
        Parameters:
        clock - The current game time.
        Returns:
        True if the entity is still uploading.

        Test if the entity is currently on a bridge.
        Returns:
        The bridge, or null if not on a bridge.

      • recoverBridge

        boolean recoverBridge(double clock)
        Order an entity to recover a bridge.
        Parameters:
        clock - The current game time.
        Returns:
        True if the bridge is already recovered (or the entity is not a bridge layer).

      • resetFuelWarning

        void resetFuelWarning()
        Reset the fuel warning flag for an entity.

      • setClearMines

        void setClearMines(boolean b)
        Order the entity to start or stop clearing mines.
        Parameters:
        b - If true, the entity will start clearing mines, otherwise it will stop.

        void setMoveTo(Coordinate coordinate)
        Set the location the entity has been ordered to move to.
        Parameters:
        coordinate - The location to move to. If null, the entity will cancel its command move order.
